name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AirBnB cleaning & deposit in search results

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See AirBnB cleaning fee, security deposit without opening each listing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever played detective on AirBnB trying to decide between multiple listings and exclude those with deposits or cleaning fees?

Install this free extension and you'll see cleaning fee and security deposit for each listing directly in search results.

Cleaning fee and security deposit will start loading right after your search results finished loading. Cleaning fee and security deposit will appear one by one starting from the top most listing.

Feature 1: It's also possible to show monthly/weekly pricing if it's present. Ping me in a review if you would like to have that.

Feature 2: It's possible to show total price for your booking if you provided dates. Ping me in a review if you would like to have that.

P.S. Cleaning fee and security deposit are shown in USD. Working on showing it in your currency of choice.
